HOME_COLLECTION.conditions: Items must be unworn, unwashed, and in their original condition with all tags attached. Underwear, swimwear, and sealed items (e.g., cosmetics) can only be returned if the hygiene seal is intact. For hygiene reasons, earrings and piercing jewellery cannot be returned.

FREE_RETURN.conditions: Items must be unworn, unwashed, and in their original condition with all tags attached. Underwear, swimwear, and sealed items (e.g., cosmetics) can only be returned if the hygiene seal is intact. For hygiene reasons, earrings and piercing jewellery cannot be returned.
FREE_RETURN.methods: Drop-off at parcel shop or locker, Home collection

QR_CODE_BARCODE_PIN.usage: Used for dropping off returns at some parcel shops and lockers.
